column1: Little Goat Diner////Thank God for my real estate agent for bringing me and my partner here for brunch one Sunday. Because this place is always busy
column2: we sat at the bar (which is full service) and ordered the fish tacos and okonomiyaki. Although I didn't love the tacos (too fried
column4: my partner DEVOURED his pork belly pancake and vowed to return soon. The best part of the meal
column6: was the bartender. He was incredibly friendly
column8: and knowledgable. Great staff and great vibe!
